forum.content:
IN TAIWAN, THERE IS MUCH INFORMATION TO LEARNING ENGLISH.

YOU CAN LEARN IT BY UR TONE.
WHEN U GO TO WORK BY MRT,
U CAN LEARN IT BY MRT' INFORMATION.

FOR EXAMPLE, ENGLISH MAP, TRAVELING INSTRUCTION.

SOMETIMES, IF U CHANGE TRAIN,
U CAN REMEMBER HOW TO CHANGE IT AND UNDERSTAND THE SITUATION IN ENGLISH.
forum.title: SPEND TIME, LEARN ENGLISH
